item.title: Table
item.description:
Table

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Table = {
	calculateUs : function(idtable, posfield) {
	var vlr = 0;
	$("#" + idtable + " tbody tr > td:nth-child(" + posfield + ")").each(
	  function(i, el) {
	  
	   var v = $(el).find('input').val();
	 
	   if ( typeof v == 'undefined') {	   
	   vlr += Number(el.innerHTML.replace(".", "").replace(",", "."));
	   
	   }else {	   
	   	 vlr += Number(v.replace(".", "").replace(",", "."));	   	 
       }
  });
 return vlr;
},
calculateBr : function(idtable, posfield) {
	return Money.formatBr(Table.calculateUs(idtable, posfield));
	}
};

item.title: Timeout
item.description:
Timeout

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Timeout = {
	set_html : function(href, time) {
		window.setTimeout(function() { window.location.href = href; }, time);
	}
};

item.title: Select
item.description:
Select

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Select = {
	option_select_attr : function(idselect, attr) {
		return $('option:selected', $('#'+idselect)).attr( attr );
	},
	remove_selected_option : function(idselect) {
		$('#' + idselect + ' option:selected').each(function() {
			$(this).remove();
		});
	},
	remove_all_option : function(idselect) {
		$('#' + idselect + ' option').each(function() {
			$(this).remove();
		});
	}
};

item.title: Radio
item.description:
Radio

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Radio = {
	checked : function(field, form) {
		return $('input[name='+field+']:checked', '#'+form).val();
	}
};

item.title: Money Format
item.description:
Money Format

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Money =
{
	formatBr: function(num) {
	    num = num.toString().replace(/\$|\,/g,'');

	    if(isNaN(num))
	        num = "0";

	    sign = (num == (num = Math.abs(num)));
	    num = Math.floor(num*100+0.50000000001);
	    cents = num%100;
	    num = Math.floor(num/100).toString();

	    if(cents<10)
	        cents = "0" + cents;

	    for (var i = 0; i < Math.floor((num.length-(1+i))/3); i++)
	        num = num.substring(0,num.length-(4*i+3))+'.'+ num.substring(num.length-(4*i+3));

	    return (((sign)?'':'-') + num + ',' + cents);
	},
	formatUs: function(num) {
		return num.replace(/\./g, "").replace(/,/, ".");
	}
}

item.title: Mask
item.description:
Mask

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Mask =
{
	mascara : function(o,f) {
		v_obj = o
		v_fun = f
		setTimeout("Mask.execmascara()", 1)
	},
	execmascara : function() {
		v_obj.value=v_fun(v_obj.value)
	},
	mdata : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2")
		return v
	},
	mhora : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1:$2")
		return v
	},
	mtelefone : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/^(\d\d)(\d)/g,"($1) $2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{4})(\d)/,"$1 - $2")
		return v
	},
	mcep : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1-$2")
		return v
	},
	mcpf : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d{1,2})$/,"$1-$2")
		return v
	},
	mcnpj : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/^(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/^(\d{2})\.(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2.$3")
		v=v.replace(/\.(\d{3})(\d)/,".$1/$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{4})(\d)/,"$1-$2")
		return v
	},
	mnumeros : function(v) {
		return v.replace(/\D/g,"")
	},
	mvalor : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d)(\d{2})$/,"$1.$2")
		return v
	},
	mvalorbr : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d)(\d{2})$/,"$1,$2")
		return v
	}
};

item.title: Input
item.description:
Input

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Input = {
	readOnly : function(id) {
		document.getElementById( id ).readOnly = true;
		document.getElementById( id ).style.backgroundColor = "#CCC";		
		document.getElementById( id ).value = '';
	},
	enabledField : function(id) {
		document.getElementById( id ).readOnly = false;
		document.getElementById( id ).style.backgroundColor = "#FFF";		
		document.getElementById( id ).value = '';
	}
};

item.title: Form Clear
item.description:
Form Clear

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Form = 
{
	clear : function(idform) {
		$('#'+idform).each(function() {
			this.reset();
		});	
	}
};

item.title: Div Position
item.description:
Div Position

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Div = {
	go : function(id) {
		$('#'+id).slideToggle('slow', function() {
    			$('html, body').animate({scrollTop:$("#"+id).offset().top}, 'slow');
		});

		return true;
	},
	hideAll: function() {
		$('div[id^="div-"]').hide();
	}
};

item.title: Data Format
item.description:
Data Format

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<table id="table" class="table" >

</table>

js

var Data =
{
	nowBr : function() { /* using jquery ui */
		return $.datepicker.formatDate( 'dd/mm/yy', new Date() );
	},	
	nowSql : function() { /* using jquery ui */
		return $.datepicker.formatDate( 'yy-mm-dd', new Date() );
	},
	today : function() { /* using javascript */
		var that = new Date();
	    return ((that.getDate() < 10)?"0":"") + that.getDate() +"/"+(((that.getMonth()+1) < 10)?"0":"") + (that.getMonth()+1) +"/"+ that.getFullYear() 
	},	
	timeNow : function() { /* using javascript */
		var that = new Date();
     	return ((that.getHours() < 10)?"0":"") + that.getHours() +":"+ ((that.getMinutes() < 10)?"0":"") + that.getMinutes() +":"+ ((that.getSeconds() < 10)?"0":"") + that.getSeconds();
	}	
};
